mlneuro.common.math¶

Functions used throughout the package

Primarily, functions that transform estimates

mlneuro.common.math.logdotexp[source]¶

Compute the dot product of two matrices in log-space by exponentiating without round-off error

mlneuro.common.math.scale_to_range(values, new_range, axis=None)[source]¶

Scales an array-like set of values to a new range over the specified axis The new range specified can be array-like, the min and max will be taken

mlneuro.common.math.tiny_epsilon(dtype)[source]¶

Returns the smallest number representable by a datatype to use as an epsilon > 0 to resolve division by 0 errors
